title: Chicken chow mein
directions: Heat the oil in a large frying pan or wok over high heat. Add the chicken, brown onion and garlic and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon to break up lumps, for 5 mins or until mince browns. Add the curry powder and stir to combine. Add the broccoli, carrot and mushroom and cook for 3 mins or until vegetables start to soften.
Add the stock, oyster sauce, tomato sauce and noodles. Cook for 2 mins. Add the peas and cabbage and cook until the cabbage just wilts.
Serve the chicken chow mein sprinkled with spring onion and sesame seeds.
ingredients: 100g broccoli, cut into small florets, halved
1 carrot, peeled, halved lengthways, sliced diagonally
